"C:\Program Files\JetBrains\CLion 2024.2.1\bin\cmake\win\x64\bin\cmake.exe" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo "-DCMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM=C:/Program Files/JetBrains/CLion 2024.2.1/bin/ninja/win/x64/ninja.exe" -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=C:/Dev/vcpkg/scripts/buildsystems/vcpkg.cmake -G Ninja -S C:\Users\maxen\source\repos\samples-Tornade-10 -B C:\Users\maxen\source\repos\samples-Tornade-10\cmake-build-relwithdebinfo
-- Running vcpkg install
waiting to take filesystem lock on C:\Dev\vcpkg\.vcpkg-root...
Detecting compiler hash for triplet x64-windows...
Compiler found: C:/Program Files/Microsoft Visual Studio/2022/Community/VC/Tools/MSVC/14.38.33130/bin/Hostx64/x64/cl.exe
All requested packages are currently installed.
Total install time: 100 ns
The package glew is compatible with built-in CMake targets:

    find_package(GLEW REQUIRED)
    target_link_libraries(main PRIVATE GLEW::GLEW)

The package glm provides CMake targets:

    find_package(glm CONFIG REQUIRED)
    target_link_libraries(main PRIVATE glm::glm)

    # Or use the header-only version
    find_package(glm CONFIG REQUIRED)
    target_link_libraries(main PRIVATE glm::glm-header-only)

sdl2 provides CMake targets:

    find_package(SDL2 CONFIG REQUIRED)
    target_link_libraries(main
        PRIVATE
        $<TARGET_NAME_IF_EXISTS:SDL2::SDL2main>
        $<IF:$<TARGET_EXISTS:SDL2::SDL2>,SDL2::SDL2,SDL2::SDL2-static>
    )

imgui provides CMake targets:

  # this is heuristically generated, and may not be correct
  find_package(imgui CONFIG REQUIRED)
  target_link_libraries(main PRIVATE imgui::imgui)

The package stb provides CMake targets:

    find_package(Stb REQUIRED)
    target_include_directories(main PRIVATE ${Stb_INCLUDE_DIR})
